title: Voice chat - can we see variable autio output (same as input options)
body:
I'm faced with sometimes being able to listen to voice but not speak on voice chat (my current situation is in order to hear voice, I need to have my headphones on, hanging off one ear so I can hear gaming sounds from my speakers - I need to be able to hear what's happening in the house si why I have an ear off)

What I would like to be able to do is

1. Ignore if I have a mic or not and be able to listen to voice chat in my premade
2. Select different outputs like you can select different inputs.

I have a webcam and even if I use the mic on it, I still need my headphones on to hear voice output.
